Solution.Title: BigBurger
Solution.Overview: You are asked to decode a string. The original String is in binary format. The encoded string is formed by adding both neighboring digits to the current digit.

Solution.Title: MostProfitable
Solution.Overview: Determine the most profitable item sold based on cost, price, and the number of sales.

Solution.Title: Inventory
Solution.Overview: Determine the number of items a business can expect to sell per month based on past averages.

Solution.Title: PickTeam
Solution.Overview: Choose the most effective team based on how well individuals work together.
